alert.note: Alert for Coastal Refugio; Coastal San Patricio; Inland Refugio; Inland San Patricio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 3:24PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern San Patricio and southwestern Refugio Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 323 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bonnie View, or 8 miles south of Woodsboro, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sinton, Taft, Bonnie View and Taft Southwest. This includes the following highways... US Highway 181 between mile markers 624 and 632. US Highway 77 between mile markers 634 and 642. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Refugio; Coastal San Patricio; Inland Refugio; Inland San Patricio
